name: Buckwheat Sour Cream Biscuits
author: Karen
summary: Delicious and easy gluten-free biscuits with the healthy twist of buckwheat flour.
ingredients: ⅓ cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Stir buckwheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Stir in sour cream and milk with a fork until dough forms a ball
Turn dough out on a lightly floured surface and knead about 5 times
Cut into rounds with a 2- or 3-inch cutter
Transfer biscuits to a nonstick baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until bottoms are nicely browned, about 15 minutes
